TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to Benjamin Fowler, 01-08-1824

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 722

div1.p: Please let Mr Betts have forty five pounds of Manufactured and twenty five pounds of hand Tobacco on My Account
25lbs Manufad. \ 25lbs hand | for Kirkendall 20lbs Mand for E. Ally /
